tweet: While I watched/appreciated Snyder’s videos, am I really the target audience? & if there is such a thing, supposing it’s “people who are funneled to repeat simplistic reactions on social media”, would such an audience listen to advice from people who find that behavior alarming?

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: As an early reader, as someone who consumes books—good & bad—as a writer: I don’t want to be “kind” to language. I want to push its limits, pull it apart and find all its secrets. I want to turn it upside down and inside out and make it call me daddy. Which makes me wonder:

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: But I think it’s that playfulness, the disruption of the expected that’s our most useful ally in averting authoritarianism. The internet IS a library shelf. One that offers space to people, I might add, who aren’t represented as well in books. You just have to look judiciously.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱

tweet: Especially confrontative, reductive politics. It probably speaks to my own mischievous nature that upon watching @TimothyDSnyder’s lesson cautioning against consuming media that simplifies thought, that “predictifies” your thinking—I wanted to make a meme about exactly that.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Is punctured by anguish
Can such relief be imagined?

It’s gravity in reverse, a pinnacle 
Dragging you upwards
Hour by aching hour
As you try to claw down

Whispering the old joke:
Zero stars, do not recommend
How can you rate
What so few understand?

AZ
2.12.2022

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
On a scale that has no numbers
Only jolts of lightning
That burn as they traverse
Nerves and flesh incomprehensibly

On a scale that is itself
A measure from despair
To desperation. Was there
Ever a one you can remember?

Or a three? When even
The sanctity of dreams

description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
More Alby poetry for any of you who are into that, this time on the topic of #ChronicPain & #Disability which is kicking my butt today, alas.

THE RATING

On a scale of one
To your entire body is buckling
Under the weight
Of a Sisyphean punishment

How do you rate your pain?

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
Kept the past buried no matter how I tried to dig

Survival, I’ve said, is written into the cells
Not in genetic code but in a language none comprehend
A whisper from out of time
To prepare, to run, to fight
Making modern trials seem trite by comparison

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
A luxury: the victory garden and rain barrels
Still in operation, decades, decades on
In my memories, their memories of a culture erased
Dim and distant like ancient cities shattered beyond belief
The determination to stay buoyed upon this new ship

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet:
But of how it felt, and not just on the celebratory morn
The return of a nation’s men with unspoken trauma
To women who had been on their own for so long

My own memories only begin four decades on
Never knowing grandparents unaltered by war
Every scrap saved, every new object

Still she and her sisters
Come to me for reassurance 
With gifts of quartz and acorns
They’ll be too old for this soon
I let them drink it in, a memory
That has too many missing companions

-AZ

tweet: Then after: what is described as honeymoon stage. Love-bombing. The reason love-bombing works is bc you feel like sh*t. *You* didn’t stop it, *you* lost control. But the more you begin to realize it isn’t YOU, the more resistant you become. & that’s when you’re in real danger.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I’ve been struck, pushed, choked in relationships. It makes you scared, sure—but it also makes you angry. Sometimes anger wins out & you fight back. Well now you’re no longer a victim, you’ve somehow become an equal participant in violence. Even if that’s clearly not the dynamic.

tweet: There’s so much I have left to do & I will do whatever I can to mitigate risk—I am vaccinated & once upon a time I thought that meant I might get sick but not die. But being immunocompromised I’ve no idea how much protection I really have & maybe this thing will get me anyway.

tweet: It makes me sad that people who totally know these things in other contexts are so unwilling to self-reflect when it comes to Jewish people. As @JennieTetreault said, at least my block & follow lists have improved. Please don’t end up on the wrong one. Praying for peace for all.

tweet: You also can’t equivocate about being an ally. You can’t demand Jewish people replicate your political beliefs to “earn” allyship from you. “You made me say Hitler was right” is no more a thing than saying being called out on racism is worse than the racism.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Again, not saying you can’t criticize Israel. I have & will probably continue to do so. But a) learn more history b) listen to people living there & c) be cautious with & cognizant of your words, how far they go & how they might be construed. There are many bad actors watching.

tweet: Here’s another thing. YOU might skirt the edges of antisemitism. You may be discreet/unaware re: dog whistles. Other folks will take that ball & keep it going. That’s why it’s VERY important to be careful with your words if you are going to comment—yes, even on Israeli govt.

tweet: Social media also provides support, education, a voice to people who would not likely otherwise have one, a network. It can expose criminals & racists, track receipts & provide humor & relief. It’s just a tool, like government itself. Just need it used correctly.

description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: A lot of the feedback from the keynote focused on how helpful that was to be said & it makes me sad to think how effed up we are as a society to tell people who have already bled & agonized & sacrificed & endured SO MUCH that no: in order for others to care you have to do more

tweet: You don’t have to be a CEO or write a book or have a film made about you that justifies your survival. Bc that’s what we’re trying to do. Survivor’s guilt is a mofo—even here, making the bed I caught myself thinking about people who might’ve done more with help *I* had & just: NO

tweet: @PenalvaCubana It says a lot about us that when spouse person proposed to me, also fairly casually, that I initially thought he was joking. “Ha ha ha, that’s a good one, love ya” 😂

description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: It does make human compassion & joy & beauty—all of the other parts of us—both more vivid & more necessary. Living in a world of broken things, those little treasures do shine. Have a lovely Saturday my friends. 💕

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: And, whether you like it or not, that’s how you live. There’s no escape. It’s jarring to encounter people who can’t or won’t see the horrors before them. Denial is one coping strategy I never really understood or could access. But living with the terrifying truth of what we are?

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: It’s almost like being able to see demons or some comic book nonsense like that—except what I see is humanity. People just don’t...get the benefit of the doubt & it’s easier to see past masks. Many who experience different traumas end up in the same space. You know the tells.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I am truly joyful to have survived my childhood. I’ve often said I had a lot of help (eventually) that many in my position do not get. All of us who know childhood trauma should get at least what I did. At least. But the surviving also confers a sort of second sight.

tweet: Bc this was written late (for me) & I put my phone down after, & bc I was asked about it: yes I’m okay & I should’ve clarified before going to sleep. I may delete this later on but I did want to post that I’m fine & my brain was just doing brain things. Sorry to cause concern! https://t.co/CMQl6BhHbJ

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: The horror of surviving a horrible thing—even as horrible as most can comprehend, or worse—isn’t that you  know what’s on the other side of the darkness. But that you too, may tread among those memories alongside regular people & know: nothing can end you, even if you beg for it.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: If anything it makes them more proud. We’ve forged a world scarcely imaginable in the 50s when, for example, my gma became a mother. One that is better because we’ve improved upon the best of what they had to give us. What brilliance shall our children & grandchildren bring!

tweet: Often I speak of my own grparents. While my gma was uncommonly kind-hearted, she wasn’t perfect, & carried some prejudice of her time. I’ve wondered if that hampers her pride in me in my commitment to do better. My strong feeling is NO it does not. Not his for Abigail, either. https://t.co/EmDh9POxet

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Now while I know Brythonic languages like Welsh are very different from the limited Irish (Gaelige) I have, there is a cadence similarity imo. Either way, it’s nice to hear in such a high quality series. There’s two very special characters in Hidden that are not played by actors:

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: So I’m on season 2 of the Welsh crime drama #Hidden & I have to say that while it has shortcomings, it’s a very strong series—season 1 was truly fantastic. It’s a rather lacking in diversity but I get it: Wales. That being said it tackles sexism in an extremely authentic manner.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @bitter_still @NotRobertaJames He’s right. A trickle of justice won’t keep Black & Brown bodies from perishing for want of it. We must exert twice the force against those white cousins pushing against us so the trickle can become a stream, a river. Even a trickle is a victory, but it’s not enough.

tweet: It’s doubtful there has been a more important issue/piece of legislation in our lifetime & the media is barely covering the issue of voting rights. So that’s a start. Once I have a moment today I will drop some reading/resources but please feel free to add any in replies.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Sometimes our mere presence as white people (esp holding a phone) can make others think twice. We can support Black-owned businesses. We can amplify Black voices. Black candidates. The primary fight right now is for VOTING RIGHTS. We MUST PASS HR4/John Lewis Voting Rights Act.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: You can talk about your pay w/coworkers, so disparities can be addressed. If you’re in healthcare, you can identify when patients aren’t being listened to & stand up for their voices. Every time I see an interaction with a Black/Brown person & a cop, I get out my phone & record.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: About these tragedies; but it’s not about us & shouldn’t be. Next is to speak up in the real world. Protests? Sure, if you’re able. But don’t forget who you’re there in support capacity for. It’s probably more meaningful to address anti-blackness & white supremacy in daily life.

tweet:
Time to be ashamed of impossible wishes & instead? Time to do the work. Work that ought be a humbling & unending occupation:
Defund white supremacy
Demolish white supremacy
Dismantle white supremacy 
Then we can talk about that other stuff, if it’s still even necessary.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Slogans are also easy & they accomplish even less. Do you know what isn’t easy? Dismantling white supremacy. But for those of us who benefit from it—no matter how much we wish we didn’t—it’s our job, our responsibility. It’s long past time for us to put down childish slogans.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Been crying most of the day. Yeah, boo hoo my ww tears. I often wish I could exchange my life for any Black person killed by white supremacy, but today? Yes, particularly the child Adam Toledo. It’s a stupid, privileged wish. Wishing is easy & even if granted, so too is dying.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: If we are fortunate enough to see Derek Chauvin go to jail it will be cops & wardens who see to his imprisonment. Maybe that’s too good for him. Maybe death isn’t terrible enough. But regardless of what happens to him: it’s white supremacy that assuages his conscience.

description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Saw a thread earlier that said prosecutors are cops too. Sure, plenty suck. Plenty uphold white supremacy just like cops. But if George Floyd gets justice, it’s prosecutors who will have helped provide it to his family—one of many in desperate need of justice.

tweet: Some say police can be replaced in many cases by social workers. But guess what? Social workers uphold white supremacy too. Social workers take Black kids from imperfect but decent homes & hand them to abusers. Sometimes the racism of social workers kills kids. Ask Devonte Hart.

tweet: @summerasana @babyrabies Obviously I would go for a longer & more obscure phrase than my example but that was just to demonstrate the concept.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @summerasana @babyrabies Since the base phrase stays the same, it’s easy for YOU to remember but hard to crack (esp w/last letters). Adding letters from the website (you can reverse them) makes it distinctive & tailored to that site. Adding your choice of punctuation (if required) is an additional layer.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @summerasana @babyrabies Pick a phrase you will easily remember. Ex: A Stitch in Time Saves Nine. Use the 1st or last letters of your *individual phrase* (using numericals if poss)+ 3-4 letters from the website needing a password + punctuation. So that phrase for a Twitter password would be “ASiTS9twit!”

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: I won’t ever give up on any of my foster care brothers & sisters. Sometimes we lash out & folks don’t understand. We’re going to see people talking about relationships we think we lost or never had. It hurts, I won’t lie. But eventually you can be grateful for their joy too. 💖

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: The foster system may have stolen or damaged your relationship w/your blood siblings—or maybe, as in my case, trauma did that. It makes celebrating today painful, like Mother’s & Father’s Day. Those of us who know what it’s like? We too are also your siblings. I’m here for you.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱

tweet: On #NationalSiblingsDay, I want to recognize my #FosterCare brothers & sisters. Whether or not we ever lived under the same roof, we will always be united in a way many cannot comprehend. I see you. I have love for you, no matter how unlovable you might sometimes feel.

description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @MumsyNancy Most “recommended usage” has behind it a reasoning, much like I laid out here: using “that” for “who” especially when say, talking about a murdered black man, can aid dehumanization, particularly when said usage is inconsistent. This is *why* style guides typically go with “who”.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @MumsyNancy Usage is an entirely different animal, depending on your degree of descriptivism vs prescriptivism. What most people don’t get is that grammar has always been about guidelines [for clarity], not rules. The Oxford comma, for instance, isn’t a yes/no precept. It depends.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: @BoobPunchTina Neurotic cats are the best & most photogenic cats! The inspiration for this thread is actually the Chauvin trial, where I am taking note of who refers to George as “that” & who uses “who” & in what circumstances. It’s been an interesting informal study.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: But someone using “that” for “who” almost always sets off a wrong answer buzzer in my head, even if I politely nod & overlook. Making the connection between that usage & potentially dehumanizing language makes it more difficult to ignore. Just something to think about.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Anyway, grammar is complicated, even—almost especially—for professionals! I tend to try to accept content on its merits, not on correct apostrophe usage. Not everyone is an editor or a grammarian, which is a good thing for those of us who are in those fields.

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Theoretically all non-human things get “that” but I prefer “who” for animal companions or anything that could be perceived as having sentience or a soul, if you will. “My cat Boris, who is neurotic, nonetheless is a wonderful cat.” https://t.co/l9hSUXP55s

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: We all know language can humanize & dehumanize & it’s my feeling that the creep of that for who (not pointing fingers, I’ve done it too!) is subconscious dehumanization. Maybe not in all cases, but in a lot of them. I’d even rather people use “who” for “that” instead!

name: AlbyZee 🌻🇺🇦🇵🇱🇮🇱
description: Writer/Editor | Crafter | FosterCare/CSA survivor-advocate | Mainer in TX | Dem #ActuallyAutistic Lupus hEDS | Am Yisrael Chai ✡️🦁🧶♿️ she/her 🏳️‍🌈
tweet: Despite not generally wanting to make a big deal about grammar (besides not caring for the input of amateurs), I’ve a pet peeve that I think I will elaborate on: using “that” for “who” as in, “My brother is a person that likes ice cream.” No, he’s a person WHO likes 🍦
